sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Here to keep the peace, US President Joe Biden arrives in Belfast to mark 25 years of the Good Friday Agreement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian forces in the Bakhmut area continue their fight as Russian troops close in on the devastated town of Chasov Yar.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russian lawmakers back a bill on electronic military conscription in a bid to catch draft dodgers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Manchester City defeat Bayern Munich in the first leg of the Champions League quarterfinals, while Inter Milan end Benefica's winning streak at the Stadium of Light.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: US President Joe Biden arrived in Belfast on Tuesday evening at the start of his four-day

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: visit to Northern Ireland and the Irish Republic. After being briefly welcomed by British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak, Biden was whisked away to his hotel. The president is in Northern Ireland to mark the 25th anniversary of the Good Friday Agreement that brought peace to this part of the United Kingdom. The U.S. helped negotiate an end to often brutal sectarian violence that killed thousands over the course of several decades. Belfast police are on high alert for the visit, which will later today have Biden making a speech at the new Ulster University.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Biden making a speech at the new Ulster University.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Biden has said his top priority is to make sure the Irish Accords and the Windsor Agreement stay in place to keep the peace. He's also expected to talk about how the U.S. administration can support Northern Ireland's fragile economy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: French on economy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Clashes between Russian forces and defending troops continue day and night on Ukraine's front line. In Chasov Yar, 10 kilometers from embattled Bakhmut, residential areas are devastated and the eastern city is surrounded on three sides by Russian forces. While most residents have already been evacuated from the city, those remaining continue their struggle to live in the war zone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: I don't care.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I want to live on pension.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I'm far from politics.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I've never been involved in politics.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And I don't watch any news now because neither TV nor radio.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In his nightly address on Tuesday, President Volodymyr Zelensky said the war has reached a critical stage, saying it was vital not to lose sight of Ukraine's path to victory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Keeping that focus was the country's Prime Minister, Denis Shmal. He is in Canada, where Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced a new round of military assistance to Ukraine, moments after the two countries signed a trade modernization agreement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Russia's lower chamber of parliament, the state Duma, has for the first time adopted a bill on electronic military draft papers. Lawmakers approved the

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: necessary legislation with lightning speed on Tuesday with near unanimity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Under the current system potential conscripts are hand-delivered paper summons at their registered address or place of work, which they have to sign for personally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But recruiters have sometimes struggled to deliver the papers to the right address.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Under new proposals, summons will be sent electronically to a potential draftee's personal account on the main government portal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They would be considered delivered as soon as they're delivered electronically.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's part of an effort to make it harder for men to avoid being drafted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In a previous mobilization at the start of the war in Ukraine, tens of thousands of draft-age men fled abroad. Russian authorities hope to catch draft dodgers this way. After the vote, Muscovites shared their feelings about the law on electronic military draft papers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This is a tool, I understand, to force.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This concerns those who probably do not want to serve and give the duty of the Motherland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I do not know, I think at such a time it is necessary to be with the Motherland. Служить, отдать долг Родине. Не знаю, мне кажется, такое время надо будет вместе с Родиной.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Цифровизация, это, конечно, здорово, но печально, что это является сигналом следующей волны мобилизации, скорее всего.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Хотелось бы, чтобы поменьше людей пострадало от этого. The changes still need to be approved by the upper house of parliament and by president Vladimir Putin before they take effect.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Myanmar's military has reportedly killed more than a hundred people including children in one of its deadliest airstrikes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Crowds have been attending a ceremony held by opponents of army rule when a fighter jet dropped bombs directly onto the gathering.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The attack targeted a village in the northwestern Sagayin region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The military is increasingly using airstrikes to counter an armed opposition, which began in 2021 when it seized power from the elected government of Aung San Suu Kyi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Police in the U.S. city of Louisville, Kentucky, have released body camera footage of Monday's mass shooting at the Old National Bank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The video shows two officers being shot at as they approach the building.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The front doors were glass, elevated from the sidewalk, and because of the reflection, the officers were not able to see the shooter inside.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Five people were killed by 25-year-old Conor Sturgeon before he was shot dead by police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: One still image from the surveillance video showed the shooter, an employee at the bank, holding a rifle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: On the steps of the Louisville bank, a memorial continues to grow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: bank a memorial continues to grow. Brazil's President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva is heading to China on a visit aimed at boosting economic ties with his country's largest trading partner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The leftist leader also hopes to re-establish Brazil on the global diplomatic scene.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He's due to meet his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping in Beijing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The U.S. will be watching the visit closely as Washington's own relations with Beijing have been strained over China's ties with Russia and its aggressive stance on Taiwan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Even outside his own country, Emmanuel Macron can't escape anger over his pension reforms.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The French president was interrupted by hecklers during a speech in the Netherlands on the future of the EU.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: When order was restored, he said Europe needs to innovate to compete with China and the U.S., particularly in net zero industries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: This is critical.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Otherwise, we will lose our sovereignty and our ability to decide.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: We will fit with the requirements.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We will become a neutral for 2050.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But with Chinese or American technologies, which will put us at risk and create a huge turmoil because it will kill jobs and it will create a situation where we will not be in a situation to decide for ourselves.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Macron has just returned from China where he was seeking to reset EU relations with the superpower.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: He has long maintained that in order for Europe to thrive in the future, it must have strategic autonomy from China and the US.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Eva Cayley is the only defendant still in prison four months after the revelation of the corruption scandal in the European Parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: In an exclusive interview with Euronews, le juré du président du Parlement précédent insiste sur son innocence et dit que sa équipe de défense demandera son release sans restrictions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Madame Kaili a été entendue maintenant les deux dernières semaines plus de 15 heures. Madame Kaili a répondu à toutes les questions et toutes les accusations des enquêteurs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Alors, il y a bien évidemment un problème, parce que ni le juge d'instruction, ni le procureur fédéral, ni les enquêteurs veulent entendre les réponses de Madame Kaili.

sentences.sentence: Dans leur vision tunnel qui est la leur, ils veulent entendre certaines réponses de madame kelly dans leur vision tunnel qui est la leur ils veulent entendre certaines réponses mais ce ne sont pas les réponses que madame kelly donne des fans et de prostituées accordé à la haie et vacailles il est réveillé des cas comme madame kelly Madame Kaili, qui sont tellement considérées comme un trophée ou un symbole, et qui sont montrées comme la Coupe du monde, un joueur de football lève la Coupe du monde, quand Madame Kaili ici est levée comme étant le symbole pour dire, même si on a des hautes fonctions, vous resterez en prison, et c'est pour surtout dire aux autres parlementaires, ne commettez pas de corruption parce que vous irez longtemps en prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Mme Kaili ne va pas s'évader en Grèce pour ne pas revenir. De toute façon, entre la Grèce et la Belgique, il y a une convention d'extradition.

sentences.sentence: Madame Kaili ne sait pas rentrer en contact avec des autres personnes qui éventuellement l'accuseraient.

sentences.sentence: Par exemple, M. Panzeri.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Madame Kaili, à ce stade-ci, est suspendue au Parlement européen, donc elle ne s'est pas récidivée, elle ne sait pas, pour autant qu'il y ait des crimes ou des délits qu'elle a recommis, elle ne sait pas recommencer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Donc aujourd'hui, ce serait d'une tristesse absolue qu'elle soit maintenue en prison. Manchester City cruised towards the Champions League semi-finals for a third year in a row after defeating Bayern Munich at home on Tuesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: After eight straight wins, the German side were blown away by City's attacking power, with goals from Rodri, Bernando Silva and Erling Haaland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere, Inter Milan fans had much to celebrate after Inaurri entered their six-match winless streak with a 2-0 victory over Benfica in the first leg of the quarter-finals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Seven-time European champions AC Milan welcome first-time quarter-finalist Napoli tonight while Real Madrid lock horns with Chelsea.
